mapper.select: select r.id, r.fk, r.sys_user_id, r.member_id, r.account, r.nickname, r.member_level, r.balance, r.super_id, r.super_account, r.super_path, r.mode, r.order_no, r.pay_type, r.pay_type_name, r.pay_account_id, r.pay_account_account, r.pay_account_owner, r.pay_account_bank_name, r.tp_interface_code, r.tp_interface_name, r.tp_merchant_id, r.tp_merchant_name, r.tp_pay_channel_id, r.tp_pay_channel_name, r.tp_order_no, r.amount, r.pay_amount, r.discount_amount, r.discount_recharge_flag, r.discount_type, r.total_amount, r.point_flag, r.dml_flag, r.normal_dml, r.discount_dml, r.recharge_person, r.recharge_time, r.status, r.remarks, r.accept_account, r.accept_time, r.auditor_account, r.audit_time, r.audit_remarks, r.browser, r.os, r.ip_address, r.user_agent, r.domain, r.sub_pay_type, r.member_type, r.currency_rate, r.currency_count, r.currency_trance_id, r.order_expire_time, r.create_by, r.create_time, r.update_by, r.update_time, r.currency m.remark as userRemark from recharge_order_history as r left join member as m on r.member_id = m.id ${ew.customSqlSegment}

select ip_address as loginIp, count(1) as frequency from recharge_order_history where 1=1
and ip_address = #{ip}
and date_format(create_time,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{beginDate},'%y%m%d')
and date_format(create_time,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{endDate},'%y%m%d')
group by ip_address
having count(1) >= #{count}
ORDER BY create_Time desc

SELECT distinct member_id as memberId, account, nickname fullName, ip_address as ipAddress, balance money, (select count(COALESCE(ip_address,'null')) from recharge_order_history where 1=1 and ip_address = ipAddress) ipCount from recharge_order_history WHERE 1 = 1 and account = #{dto.account} and ip_address = #{dto.loginIp}
and date_format(create_time,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{dto.beginTime},'%y%m%d')
and date_format(create_time,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{dto.endTime},'%y%m%d')
group by member_id, ip_address order by member_id desc, create_time desc
